Return ONLY JSON with keys: verdicts(list of {fact,winner,confidence,reason}), overall_confidence (0..1), should_pause_for_human (bool), human_question (str).

The investigation will not include any offline or non-digital sources.", "agent_findings": {"direct_search_summary": "### TASK A — PLANNER NOTES

- Hassan II was King of Morocco from 1961 to 1999.
- Hassan Djeebet, a hospitality author, was born in Tangier.

### Top URLs
1. https://www.superprof.ng/name-hassan-and-passionate-about-the-french-language-since-2014-have-been-teaching-the-secondary-school-level-and.html
2. https://uk.linkedin.com/in/hassan-belhaj-17b09585
3. https://create-to-learn.blog/2019/04/29/in-moroccan-classrooms/
4. https://africasacountry.com/2019/07/a-very-american-story
5. https://www.hospitalitynet.org/author/148004272/hassan-djeebet.html

### Next Action
Verify the professional background of Hassan Zizy and Hassan Belhaj through their respective profiles and websites.

### TASK B — MANAGER WRAP-UP

1. **Image-based findings**  
   No reverse image search results were provided, so we cannot determine if Lens produced useful results.

2. **Web search candidates**

     why: He is a French teacher with a profile matching the search query.

     why: He is associated with the English Language Centre of Tangier, which could be relevant to teaching French.

3. **Research notes & context**  
   Important evidence includes profiles on Superprof and LinkedIn, as well as articles mentioning individuals named Hassan in the context of Morocco and education. There are inconsistencies in the roles and backgrounds of the individuals found, requiring further verification.

4. **Conclusion & recommendation**  
   Multiple candidates are plausible, including Hassan Zizy and Hassan Belhaj. Human input is required to verify the professional backgrounds and determine the best match.
